ComicInfo.Title: The Wrath of the Wrecker!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Wrath of the Wrecker!: Dr. Blake slips away from operating on a patient so that, as Thor, he can battle The Wrecker. Having defeated his foe, he returns and successfully completes the operation.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:14:00. [Issue ID 23178]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
